Package rlu.sqltrainer.domain

Covers aspects of domain objects, which are relevant for the SQL Trainer.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Database Maintains all those properties of a database, which are needed by the SQLTrainer to access it properly.
Exercise An exercise basically consists of an ID, a type, a theme, and a question text.
ExerciseSet Represents a set of exercises.
Feedback A feedback refers to a given answer and consists of a string with comments and optionally a quantitative measure of correctness.
 

Enum Summary
Exercise.Type Currently, only two types are supported.
 

Package rlu.sqltrainer.domain Description

Covers aspects of domain objects, which are relevant for the SQL Trainer.
